dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a major Chinese e-commerce platform, consisting of 87,194 instances annotated with the position of attribute values mentioned in product descriptions, covering 26 types of product attributes.
dcterms:title: MEPAVE

dcterms:creator: Haoran Li
Peng Yuan
Song Xu
Youzheng Wu

Bowen Zhou
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1.4 million instances collected from a major Chinese e-commerce platform, covering three categories of products: Home Appliances, Clothing, and Cases & Bags, with each instance being a (product information, product summary) pair.
dcterms:title: CEP-SUM

dcterms:creator: Meng Chen

Bowen Zhou
dcterms:description: A large-scale multi-turn Chinese dialogue dataset for E-commerce customer service, containing 1,024,196 multi-turn sessions and 20,451,337 utterances.
dcterms:title: JDDC

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
H. Wu
dcterms:description: A dataset for multi-turn dialogue in e-commerce, covering various types of conversations based on 20 commodities.
dcterms:title: ECD
